sentences.sContent: He's never going to be able to forget it. And I don't think he should.
sentences.sCn: 他将永远都不会忘记它。而且我认为他也不应该忘记。

sentences.sContent: Should our children be taught to swim at school?
sentences.sCn: 我们的孩子应该在学校学游泳吗？

phrases.pCn: 我该怎么办；我应该做些什么

trans.tranOther: You use should when you are saying what would be the right thing to do or the right state for something to be in
